body.para: The Course Schedule displays a calendar of classes in a graphical format. It is especially useful to review the courses created/edit in Add/Edit Courses
The calendar may be filtered by Term, Venue and/or Course Type. To access the filter dialog, click the Filter on the calendar's toolbar.

By default, the schedule is displayed as one work week (Monday to Friday). This may be changed by clicking the buttons to the right on top of the graphic. Once changed, the selection will remain in place until it is changed.
Click an individual class to display a pop-up with further details.
Filter by a single venue. Any classes with overlapping times will be displayed next to each other. These are classes with conflicting times.
